bash.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to hit someone or something hard, in a way that causes pain or damage
bash.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Someone bashed him on the back of his head.
Police bashed down the door to get in.
He bashed his head on the back of the seat.
I accidentally bashed into a woman pushing a pram.
bash.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to criticize someone or something very strongly
bash.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: He was always bashing the trade unions.
bash.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a party or an event to celebrate something
